mapper.sql: id, name, parent_id, url, code, icon, type, level, status, sort, remark, version, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select p.code from sys_user u inner join sys_role r on u.role_id = r.id inner join sys_role_permission rp on r.id = rp.role_id inner join sys_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where u.status = 1 and r.status = 1 and rp.status = 1 and p.status = 1 and u.deleted = 0 and u.id = #{userId};

select p.* from sys_user u inner join sys_role r on u.role_id = r.id inner join sys_role_permission rp on r.id = rp.role_id inner join sys_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where u.status = 1 and u.deleted = 0 and r.status = 1 and rp.status = 1 and p.status = 1 and u.id = #{userId}
